update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
